General.Name: Shanghai Nar Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai NAR Industrial Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells digital printing materials in China. The company provides self-adhesive vinyl series, one way vision films, cold laminating films, glass films, vinyl wrap fims, floor graphics, wall papers and clothes, paint protection films, and inkjet inks under the NAR, INFLEX, BN, NAR PPF, Yifan, INKBANK, PPFSHELL, NarPremium, Proflex, NAR hydrogen, and AIPRINT brand names. Shanghai NAR Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Ai Jun You
1.Title: Sec. of the Board, CFO & Deputy GM
